name: Template Status Code (more authoring statuses)
publisher: Health Level Seven, Inc. - [WG Name] WG
description: Status code taken from [HL7 template specification](http://wiki.hl7.org/images/7/7a/TemplatesDSTU-20140910b-96.pdf.zip) - allows for alignment with the template DSTU, and has more authoring status codes.

element.formal: Status code taken from [HL7 template specification](http://wiki.hl7.org/images/7/7a/TemplatesDSTU-20140910b-96.pdf.zip) - allows for alignment with the template DSTU, and has more authoring status codes.
element.comments: The Profile status has the codes that are relevant to end-users/developers, while this extension has the codes used by profile developers.

binding.name: TemplateStatusCode
binding.description: The status indicates the level of maturity of the design and may be used to manage the use of the design
